DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To evaluate impact quality-of-life assessment routine oncology practice satisfaction care , health-related quality-of-life , toxicity patient primary nonmetastatic head neck cancer treat radiotherapy . Secondary - To evaluate feasibility use quality-of-life tool routine oncology practice . - To evaluate impact occurrence toxicity . - To determine impact overall survival . - To study concordance toxicity report clinician report patient quality-of-life questionnaire . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord sex , tumor localization , TNM stage . Patients randomize 1 2 arm . - Arm I : Patients complete quality-of-life questionnaire ( EORTC tool , include EORTC QLQ-SAT32 , EORTC QLQ-C30 , specific module QLQ-H & N35/Euroqol EQ-5D ) consultation clinician one year . - Arm II : Patients undergo standard follow-up care comprise consultation clinician one year . After completion study , patient follow every 3 month 1 year 2 year .
